channel.title: CVE Feed for ControlByWeb -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ControlByWeb -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6333|2024-08-02T08:28:21.197Z -- controlbyweb -- x-332-24i
item.description: The affected ControlByWeb Relay products are vulnerable to a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability, which could allow an attacker to inject arbitrary scripts into the endpoint of a web interface that could run malicious javascript code during a user's session.
